export function getBadgeByDeviation(deviation){const absDeviation=Math.abs(deviation);if(absDeviation>=50)return'ALTA';if(absDeviation>=20)return'MEDIA';return'BAIXA';}export function formatCopyTemplate(template,vars){return template.replace(/\{(\w+)\}/g,(match,key)=>{var _vars$key;return String((_vars$key=vars[key])!==null&&_vars$key!==void 0?_vars$key:match);});}export function getOpportunityExplanation(level,currentPercent,historicalPercent,extraValue){const template=COPY.top3Card.porqueOportunidade[level];return formatCopyTemplate(template,{atual:currentPercent.toFixed(1),historico:historicalPercent.toFixed(1),valor:"R$ ".concat((extraValue/1e9).toFixed(1)," BI"),percent:Math.abs((currentPercent-historicalPercent)/historicalPercent*100).toFixed(0)});}
